Articles.Content:
Recently a piece of the space shuttle Challenger was found lying on the seafloor. The question is, which piece? It hasn't been released which, to my knowledge.

Imma throw this guess: It's the tip of the shuttle's wing.

https://twitter.com/HISTORY/status/1590722716931620864

This is apprently it. Not the tip itself.
saw it on the news, looks like a section of wing where you could make out the thermal tiles. it was pretty well preserved.
